title: im no blitz main (hes too hard to aim) but i got a question...
body: does AP blitz build ludens/lichbane? it gives mana (shield passive)/damage.

replies.body: You dont build either of those items but if you want lost chapter id recommend icy bolts instead, as you won't proc ludens much and a slow is far more beneficial

> [{quoted}](name=Kazekiba,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=npEF1EEe,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-08-09T00:47:01.782+0000)
>
> You dont build either of those items but if you want lost chapter id recommend icy bolts instead, as you won't proc ludens much and a slow is far more beneficial

that sounds about right. i mean it adds in more CC to your enemies issue.
